Posts.EditableText: How do I center text in Squiffy?
Posts.HTML: How do I center text in Squiffy?

Posts.EditableText:
You'd need to use html/css. See [url=http://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_div_align.asp:2qi2k2u1]this page[/url:2qi2k2u1], under "CSS syntax":

[code:2qi2k2u1]<div style="text-align:center">Text goes here.</div>[/code:2qi2k2u1]

There's an example you can try for yourself [url=http://www.w3schools.com/tags/tryit.asp?filename=tryhtml_div_align_css:2qi2k2u1]here[/url:2qi2k2u1].

Posts.EditableText: This may help: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1712 ... inline-css Text formatting is not specific to Squiffy, so you can just google something like "font size html inline css" or look it up at a html/css reference site, like http://www.w3schools.com. That's what I do.
